summary: Only a few hours remain for our 28hr Birthday Charity Stream! 🥂🎉🎉
title: Only a few hours remain for our 28hr Birthday Charity Stream! 🥂🎉🎉
body:
We want to spend our last hours of the marathon doing something EXTRA special, so we’re saving the best videos for last! 

Look forward to it ~😉💖 https://www.rabb.it/s/h60d52

All remaining fanworks will be raffled off near the end as well. Everyone’s donations are much appreciated, and thank you for those who couldn’t donate but has supported us by sharing the event! 

Make sure to tune in the chat to see if your name got chosen as a winner! 

https://www.justgiving.com/fundraising/pg-dan28

blog.name: alittledizzy
blog.title: a.little.dizzy
blog.description:
there is a voice inside of you
that whispers all day long
i feel that this is right for me
i know that this is wrong
no teacher preacher parent friend
or wise man can decide
what's right for you - just listen to
the voice that speaks inside
- shel silverstein

Mandy. 30s.
Scifi fan, youtube fan, puppy fan.
RPF heavy blog.

Don't be a dick. :)

summary: Phandom Gives Charity Drive
title: Phandom Gives Charity Drive
body:
Hello, lovely people! Are you tired of me tweeting about this charity yet? Whoops, too bad! One more announcement post to make! 

Sarah (@waveydnp) and I (@alittledizzy) are auctioning off a co-written fic for the @phandomgives auction! 

  • This fic will be 5,000 words minimum (which, if you look at our history of co-written fics, means almost definitely more than 5k!) and we’re willing to work with you on a prompt that fulfills what you want to read and suits our style of writing! 
  • Guidelines: no explicit rating for underage donors, no character death, no unhappy endings, no hard kink. We’re open to discussion about anything else!
  • If you’re new to our fic writing, you can find examples [HERE] [HERE] and [HERE]! 
  • If you win, you will be donating directly to Dan’s birthday drive on JustGiving! 
  • Auction ends on June 11 so get your bids in fast! 

[BID HERE!]

If you want to check out the other fanworks auctions happening, click [here] for auction-style and [here] for first come, first serve offerings!

summary: For dapg videos that always make me happy: the charades videos, the quickdraw videos (mainly for how strangely phil interprets...
question: For dapg videos that always make me happy: the charades videos, the quickdraw videos (mainly for how strangely phil interprets things), yasuhati, katamari, bishi bashi, the crash bandicoot ones they did too but my most peak happy making fave is gang beasts how I wish they returned to that for a dvp alas :( i also usually put on undertale/sims/mariokart playlists for background enjoyment p often 💖 - snekydingdong (i can't send stuff off my side blog but don't want to ~expose my irl main 😳 )
answer:
Omgggg I forgot about yasuhati!! I couldn’t breathe watching it it was so freaking funny 😂

Thank you honey! These are all great! ☺️

summary:
Phandom Gives Charity Drive
Hi there, I'm participating as a creator for @phandomgives charity drive for Dan's bday, I'm...
body:
Phandom Gives Charity Drive

Hi there, I’m participating as a creator for @phandomgives charity drive for Dan’s bday, I’m offering 1 fan fiction for Auction. The bid starts at 5£ for a story written based on a prompt chosen by you!

I’m willing to write a Dan/Phil fic as long as it’s not non-con, doesn’t have major character death and doesn’t involve abusive themes

The link to bid is this: https://forms.gle/N7Zx2DGQhvEvaBfK9

And you can bid until Dan’s birthday on June 11th!

You can check out my ao3 or the tag “my works” to see the stories I’ve already posted <3

summary: I’m Offering Commissions for Phandom Gives!
body:
I’m Offering Commissions for Phandom Gives!

Hello everyone!

I’m sure many of you have seen, but if you haven’t, I thought I’d make a formal post! To help with the donations for Dan’s birthday drive, I have decided to commission 2 Fics and 5 Gif Sets!

For the 2 Fics: I’ll accept commissions from any person of any age! I just will not do NSFW aspects for someone who is under 18. I am open to writing any topic and any trope but major character death and mental health issues/suicide and non-con elements. If you want to see my fics, you can go to my fic page here

For the 5 Gif Sets: I’ll accept anything for those! You can ask me to gif any video you want from any YouTuber or I can even try and gif your favorite scenes from your favorite movie! I’m open to any possibilities. If you want to see some of my gifs, you can check out my gif tag (the most recent gifs are my style now)

To commission either one of these from me, all you have to do is donate to Dan’s birthday drive here!

For a fic, donate £5 and then message me here or email me with your receipt/proof of donation.

For a gif set, donate £1 and then follow the same guidelines as a fic!

If you want to check out what other people are also offering for first come, first serve, you can check out this link!

If you have any questions, please go to @phandomgives or if you have any questions for me about anything, you can email me at princesslexi763@gmail.com or message me here!

Happy donating!

summary: SPECIAL RAFFLE TIME! We are hosting two raffles very soon! 1. At 40 people in the stream, we will have a giveaway for a fanwork...
caption:
SPECIAL RAFFLE TIME!

We are hosting two raffles very soon!

1. At 40 people in the stream, we will have a giveaway for a fanwork of your choice (fanart, fanfic, gifs, edits, beta reading)

2. At 50 people in the stream, we are giving away a  £25 DANANDPHILSHOP GIFT CARD! This is for EVERYONE, you don’t need to donate, you just need to RSVP.

Join our stream and share this so that the raffles can happen! Let’s celebrate @danielhowell and help charity 🥰

https://www.rabb.it/s/judhcr

by jestbee

They met her after tour. Martyn’s friend’s dog had puppies and Phil fell in love at first sight. Dan did too, but he’ll deny it if you ask.

Dan tries to keep his distance, because she’s Phil’s dog not his, but she isn’t having any of it.
